submissions.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in User Profile
submissions.description: Discovered a stored XSS vulnerability in the user profile bio field
submissions.impact: Potential account takeover, session hijacking, and phishing attacks
submissions.discovery: While testing input validation, noticed the bio field wasn't properly sanitizing HTML input
submissions.remediation: Implemented proper output encoding using DOMPurify library and Content Security Policy headers

submissions.title: SQL Injection in Search Functionality
submissions.description: Found SQL injection vulnerability in the search parameter
submissions.impact: Complete database compromise, ability to read/modify/delete sensitive user data
submissions.discovery: During testing, noticed error messages that revealed database structure
submissions.remediation: Migrated to parameterized queries and implemented prepared statements
